greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n mod 14.
comment: More generally, a(n) = n^(7^k) mod 14, for k >= 0. - _Altug Alkan_, Mar 25 2016
program: (Sage) [power_mod(n,7,14) for n in range(0, 93)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Oct 28 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 13 2002
